xmlText.p: MINNESOTA TWINS — Agreed to terms with RHPs Myles Jaye, Michael Kohn and Jake Reed; Cs Willians Astudillo, Brian Navarreto and Bobby Wilson; INFs Taylor Featherston, Nick Gordon, Gregorio Petit and Brock Stassi; and OFs Nick Buss, Ryan LaMarre and LaMonte Wade on minor league contracts.

TEXAS RANGERS — Named Josiah Igono major league director of peak performance; Brett Hayes major league advance scout; Randy Smith and Al Hargesheimer pro scouts; Casey Fox assistant, player development; Eric Gagne pitching coach for Arizona League Rangers, Don Kalkstein senior advisor and Andrew Koo analyst, baseball operations.
NEW YORK METS — Agreed to terms with 3B Todd Frazier on a two-year contract.
ROAD WARRIORS — Named Ellie Rodriguez manager and Rafael Montalvo pitching coach.
NEW YORK KNICKS — Traded C Willy Hernangomez to Charlotte for 2020 and 2021 second-round draft picks and F Johnny O'Bryant.
CLEVELAND BROWNS — Named Sam Shade assistant special teams coach.

DETROIT LIONS — Named David Corrao director of football research, Paul Pasqualoni defensive coordinator, Jeff Davidson offensive line coach, George Godsey quarterbacks coach, Al Golden linebackers coach, Brian Stewart defensive backs coach and Chris White tight ends coach.
ECHL — Announced commissioner Brain McKenna will be leaving the league this summer.
MLS PLAYERS ASSOCIATION — Named Dan Jones chief operating officer.
SEATTLE SOUNDERS FC — Acquired $50,000 in general allocation money from D.C. United for D Oniel Fisher.
JACKSONVILLE ARMADA — Agreed to terms with D Kalen Ryden, Fs Ciaran Kilduff and Derek Gebhard and MF J.C. Banks.
ITF — Reduced the ban on Ilie Nastase by eight months and doubled his fine to $20,000 following his appeal of sanctions for foul-mouthed comments and misconduct as the Romanian Fed Cup captain.
GEORGIA TECH — Announced the resignation of men's assistant basketball coach Darryl LaBarrie.
RUTGERS — Named Nunzio Campanile running backs coach.
